Package projektarbeit.immobilienverwaltung.validation

Class UniqueEmailValidator

java.lang.Object
projektarbeit.immobilienverwaltung.validation.UniqueEmailValidator
All Implemented Interfaces:
jakarta.validation.ConstraintValidator<UniqueEmail, String>
@Component public class UniqueEmailValidator extends Object implements jakarta.validation.ConstraintValidator<UniqueEmail,String>
Validator class for checking if an email is unique. Implements the ConstraintValidator interface to validate the uniqueness of an email.
